akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1144. Funding(a) AuthorizationsThere are authorized to be appropriated to carry out this subchapter $2,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2022 through 2026.
(b) DerivationFunds to carry out the activities under this subchapter shall be derived from amounts authorized to be appropriated pursuant to the preceding subsection that are enacted after January 5, 2021.
(Pub. L. 116–289, § 5, Jan. 5, 2021, 134 Stat. 4888.)
Editorial Notes Codification Section was enacted as part of the Young Fishermen’s Development Act, and not as part of titles I and II of Pub. L. 89–454 which comprise this chapter.
(a) Authorizations There are authorized to be appropriated to carry out this subchapter $2,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2022 through 2026.

(b) Derivation Funds to carry out the activities under this subchapter shall be derived from amounts authorized to be appropriated pursuant to the preceding subsection that are enacted after January 5, 2021.
